name: Wugtrio
flavorText: It has a vicious temperament, contrary to what its appearance may suggest. It wraps its long bodies around prey, then drags the prey into its den.

previous.name: Wiglett
previous.flavorText: This Pokémon can pick up the scent of a Veluza just over 65 feet away and will hide itself in the sand.

next.name: Bombirdier
next.flavorText: It gathers things up in an apron made from shed feathers added to the Pokémon’s chest feathers, then drops those things from high places for fun.
